title: How About Being Honest?
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Funfufu~n♪ Ah, Maki! Nico got some of Nico’s specialty, Nico Nico cream puffs Nico! Try it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Nico Nico cream puffs? Aah, you drew your face on them, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s not all! Nico put three different creams into it, custard, whipped cream, and chocolate cream. There’s no way you wouldn’t come out smiling after eating this ~. Come on, eat it, here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>*munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Rina couldn’t stop eating it, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Rina....? Well, I suppose Rina would like something like this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Fufuun, maybe you’re the type to get so moved by it that you become speechless?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh? Come on, say something....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I can’t help it, okay.... It was really delicious, so.... Geez, if you’re going to look that worried, then at least tell me to praise it straight up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
